articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Joint Statement" of UNSC Rebuffed
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Joint Statement" of UNSC Rebuffed
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Sunday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that permanent members of the UN Security Council issued a "joint statement" pulling up the DPRK:
					 The permanent members of the UNSC which took part in the first preparatory meeting for the 2015 NPT Review Conference now under way in Vienna released a "joint statement" pulling up the DPRK over its launch of satellite for peaceful purposes and demanding it stop its nuclear activities and dismantle its nuclear deterrence. 
					
					 This is a grave illegal action of violating the sovereignty of the DPRK and its right to use space and nuclear energy for peaceful purposes, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					
					 The gravity of the matter is that the member nations unilaterally accepted the U.S. brigandish demand in contravention of the principle of action for action laid down in the September 19 joint statement, turning their faces away from the crimes the U.S. has committed by spawning the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula through ceaseless nuclear threats and hostile policy in breach of the principle of impartiality. 
					
					 It is the member nations that have conducted much more nuclear tests and stockpiled much more nukes than other countries in the world. 
					
					 They have no moral qualification to say anything about the nuclear issue of someone as they keep arsenals of nukes enough to kill the whole mankind hundreds of times. It is like a guilty party filing the suit first that these countries took issue with the DPRK which has been directly exposed to the threat of nuclear war for the longest period. 
					
					 They let loose such sophism at a meeting reviewing the implementation of the NPT in an effort to divert its attention in a bid to evade the fulfillment of the commitment to nuclear disarmament, prompted by their purpose to perpetuate their monopoly of nukes. 
					
					 If the nuclear powers are to deter more countries from withdrawing from the NPT, they should respect the rights of all the countries to use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes as required by the basic mission of the NPT, and stop making word-play and sleight of hand over their commitment to nuclear disarmament. 
					
					 Gone are days never to return when the U.S. could threaten the DPRK with A-bombs. 
					
					 The DPRK, depending on its nuclear deterrence for self-defence, will firmly protect its sovereignty and dynamically push forward the development of space for peaceful purposes and the industry of nuclear energy and proudly build a thriving nation where its people will fully enjoy prosperity under socialism.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Study Society
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Study Society
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in an inaugural meeting of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism on May 3.
					 The letter said:
					
					 We formed the new Society for Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism and decided to conduct activities, holding the august names of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem in the future. 
					
					 The President founded the Juche idea, enabling the exploited and oppressed popular masses to emerge masters of the world and their destiny and enjoy their independent and creative lives, while protecting their noblest dignity.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, remaining loyal to the President all his life, formulated the President's revolutionary idea as Kimilsungism, laid a firm groundwork for building a thriving socialist nation by dint of Songun politics and successfully solved the issue of succession to the revolution so as to accomplish the cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Un more correctly estimated Kim Jong Il's feats on the highest plane, formulated the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea as Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism and clarified that the work for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism as a supreme programme of the party with the centenary of the birth of the President as an occasion, 
					
					 More than three decades have passed since the formation of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism, the group for the study of the Juche idea going by the august name of the President.
					
					 Since the President passed away, we have boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il, but could not realize our wish to officially use Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism in our designation. 
					
					 Words fail how to express our thanks to Kim Jong Un who formulated Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism, our long-cherished desire, and clarified their profound meanings.
					
					 Only victory will be in store for us advancing under the banner of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism.
					
					 The participants in the letter vowed to devote themselves to independence of Japan and global independence through their activities to deeply study and widely disseminate the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam to Visit Indonesia and Singapore
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam to Visit Indonesia and Singapore
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, will soon pay an official goodwill visit to Indonesia at the invitation of its President Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono.
					 He will also visit Singapore.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Paid by Participants of Meeting on Land Management
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Paid by Participants of Meeting on Land Management
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Meeting of Activists in General Mobilization Movement for Land Management laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday.
					 They paid tribute in boundless reverence to the peerlessly great men after laying a floral basket.

articles.title: Participants in Meeting of Activists of Land Management Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Meeting of Activists of Land Management Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of Activists of the General Mobilization Movement for Land Management visited Mangyongdae on Sunday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of President Kim Il Sung, and those of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, before paying silent tribute to them. 
					
					 Then they visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum and moved to the President's old home.
					
					 Being briefed on the President's immortal revolutionary career and the patriotic and revolutionary family members of Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics.
					
					 Meanwhile, they visited the Revolutionary Martyrs' Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, and paid tribute to her.
					
					 They visited the Central Tree Nursery where they were admired to see saplings of various species growing healthy in terraced fields.
					
					 They spent a pleasant time at the Kaeson Youth Park in the evening of that day.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Kumyagang Army-People Power Station and Kumya Youth Coal Mine
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Kumyagang Army-People Power Station and Kumya Youth Coal Mine
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Saturday learned about the work at the Kumyagang Army-People Power Station and the Kumya Youth Coal Mine on the spot.
					 The first leg of his visit was the Kumyagang Army-People Power Station.
					
					 He held a consultative meeting after going round various places of the station. It took measures for boosting the electricity production by operating the generating equipment in full capacity and underscored the need for the related units to supply equipment and materials necessary for the operation of the power station.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the Kumya Youth Coal Mine.
					
					 He learned in detail about the coal production there before holding a consultative meeting of the officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 The meeting called on the officials to take good care of workers true to the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble idea of loving people and took measures for providing a satisfactory supply of coal badly needed by various fields of the national economy.

articles.title: LED Lights Exhibition Held
articles.content:
LED Lights Exhibition Held
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- A LED exhibition was held in Thongil Street of Pyongyang. 
					 On display there were various kinds of LED lights made by the Research Institute of the Electronic Products of the Ministry of Electronics Industry.
					
					 The exhibition drew keen interest of visitors.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a bylined article to the 21st anniversary of the publication of the work of leader Kim Jong Il "Our Socialism Centred on the Masses Shall Not Perish". 
					 This work published on May 5, 1991 clarifies the advantages and vitality of Korean socialism centred on the popular masses, an embodiment of the Juche idea, and the solidity and invincibility of the socialist system whereby the leader, the party and people are single-mindedly united, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The great Juche idea and Songun idea are the steadfast guidelines guaranteeing the invincibility of Korean socialism. 
					
					 It is the Songun idea that comprehensively reflects all the principles and requirements of the Juche idea for achieving independence of the popular masses. 
					
					 Now the Workers' Party of Korea solves all the problems arising in socialist construction, guided by the Songun idea. The dignity and might of socialist Korea has been radically exalted thanks to the WPK's Songun politics which puts forward the People's Army as a driving force of the revolution and dynamically pushes forward socialist construction in reliance upon it. 
					
					 The Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il became the main source of strength which developed the revolutionary ranks of the DPRK into those of revolutionary comrades who share the same intention, purpose, idea and will. 
					
					 The single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people who absolutely trust and follow their leader serves as an engine to achieve fresh victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of socialism. The slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Un!" is enshrined in the hearts of all the service personnel and people as invariable faith. 
					
					 The Korean People's Army has grown to be an invincible revolutionary army with modern offensive and defensive means and strong nuclear deterrence and the whole country has turned into an invulnerable bulwark which no enemy dares attack thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il who gave top priority to military affairs. 
					
					 Korean socialism will be ever-victorious as it has military power strong enough to beat back any imperialist aggression at a single blow.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak Group of Rendering Situation Extremely Tense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Lee Myung Bak Group of Rendering Situation Extremely Tense
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is getting evermore reckless in its moves to realize its scenario for invading the north, hell-bent on escalating confrontation and tension. This is creating a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The hideous provocations of the Lee group are the worst confrontation hysteria in the history of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The Lee group has pushed forward plots against the DPRK and hideous provocations to it as basic means for bedeviling the north-south relations, pursuant to the anti-reunification "policy toward the north." This has put the north-south relations into an irretrievable catastrophe. 
					
					 It is not exaggeration to say that the north-south relations are bound to lead to a war due to the Lee group's reckless actions. 
					
					 The Lee group bereft of any reason or discreet has already gone beyond the danger-line. 
					
					 Badly beaten at home and abroad, the Lee group tries hard to seek a way out in creating security instability by way of cooking up "the north wind".
					
					 Prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is a touch-and-go situation created by the Lee maniacs who are so keen on confrontation with compatriots as they are shaking their fists towards the Heaven, unaware that their fate is at stake. 
					
					 All Koreans can never be in peace unless the Lee group is thrown overboard.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slashes at Chief Executive for Lending No Ear to People's Demands
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slashes at Chief Executive for Lending No Ear to People's Demands
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on May 1 carried an editorial slashing at the puppet chief executive for lending no ear to the people's demand for rights to existence, subservient to the U.S.
					 The editorial recalled that the chief executive at a meeting of senior presidential secretaries of Chongwadae talked nonsense about the need to pursue a package of policies concerning prices of commodities, jobs, people's health and security, while vociferating about import of American beef. 
					
					 The editorial said what Lee uttered is nothing but foolish rhetoric to calm down the people's anger at the import of American beef. 
					
					 It is not something new that Lee Myung Bak unilaterally trumpeted about anything he liked to say, while feigning ignorance of the issues pending urgent solutions, the editorial deplored, and continued:
					
					 Recently trade unions have made ceaseless protests against the authorities' moves to control media and scandals among Lee's confidants are being disclosed one after another. But he keeps mum about all these matters.

articles.title: Candlelight Meeting Held in S. Korea against American Beef Import
articles.content:
Candlelight Meeting Held in S. Korea against American Beef Import
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Members of media trade union and people from all walks of life in south Korea held a candlelight meeting in Seoul on May 3 in demand of a stop to American beef import. 
					 Speakers at the meeting said that they launched the action just as south Koreans did in 2008 because the "government" is set to ceaselessly import American beef in breach of its promise to halt at once the import of such beef in case of the occurrence of mad cow disease in the U.S.
					
					 The authorities claim they dispatched a survey team to the U.S. to confirm the occurrence of the above-said disease in the U.S., but that is nothing but an artifice to fool people and waste taxes, they said, and went on:
					
					 The issue of mad cow disease is not a simple matter related to the import of American beef but one concentrically reflecting all the crimes the regime has committed by deceiving and fleecing the people. 
					
					 If Lee is allowed to stay in power, he will let all people sacrifice their lives as he wrested power to earn money, his forte. 
					
					 South Koreans will surely punish the present authorities and block the import of beef infected with mad cow disease. 
					
					 The participants in the meeting expressed their will to continue their candlelight action by the concerted efforts of the people from all walks of life.

articles.title: Fascist Action against S. Korean Woman
articles.content:
Fascist Action against S. Korean Woman
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Chungju branch of the puppet Prosecutor's Office in Chongju District on May 3 brought an indictment against a woman for praising the DPRK on charge of violation of draconic "Security Law" before putting her in custody, according to south Korean "Yohap News".
					 The puppet prosecution accused her of posting on the Internet at least 170 articles and animation files from August 2010 lauding President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il while praising the system in the north and urging the withdrawal of the U.S. forces.
					
					 The prosecution took the above-said action also on charges that acting as a writer, she posted an article titled "A collection of names of those to be punished after reunification," condemning conservative media persons for defaming progressive forces.
					
					 The group of traitors is resorting to fascist crackdown, taken aback by the voices growing stronger among people in south Korea revering the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who defended and glorified the dignity and pride of the nation.

articles.title: Japanese Society for Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism Formed
articles.content:
Japanese Society for Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism Formed
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Society for Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism was formed with due ceremony in Tokyo on May 3.
					 Attending it were personages from all walks of life and masses including Juche idea followers, personages of organizations for Japan-DPRK friendship and scholars. A vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan was present there.
					
					 Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by Dewi Sukarno, member of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers referred to the pleasure of being the first to form the society at a historic juncture when the advance of a new century of Juche started under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un after proudly reviewing the 100 year history of Juche recorded with victory and glory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They vowed to intensify the positive activities for studying and disseminating the Juche idea for building a new society in Japan under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism.
					
					 A declaration on forming the society was adopted and rules of the society were instituted at the meeting.
					
					 Kinhide Mushakoji was elected advisor to the society, Kikuo Tashiro chairman, Keizo Sumiya vice-chairwoman and Yoshiharu Okada general secretary. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Not Qualified to Talk about Nation and Country: Japanese Public Figure
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Not Qualified to Talk about Nation and Country: Japanese Public Figure
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak does not have any slightest qualification to talk about the nation or the country as he is hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces, ignoring the historic significance of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. Koichiro Narumi, secretary general of the Hokkaido Citizens' Council for Japan-Korea Solidarity, said this in a statement issued on April 29 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its frantic moves for escalating confrontation with the DPRK after hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The secretary general went on:
					
					 First Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Un in his speech on April 15 clarified the magnanimous stand on achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea that the party and government of the DPRK will join hands with anyone who truly wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation and make responsible and patient efforts to realize the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 Lee, however, insisted that the DPRK's satellite launch is a missile launch, again disclosing his ulterior aim seeking "change" of someone.
					
					 The DPRK issued statements one after another vehemently condemning Lee's hysteria.
					
					 The "Republic of Korea" in the south is a puppet regime faked up by foreign forces to dominate the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Lee group does not have even the slightest qualification to talk about the nation and the country as it is bandits escalating the tension in Northeast Asia, disregarding the historic significance of the centenary of the birth of the President.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Praise Kim Il Sung as Great Father of Progressive Humankind
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Praise Kim Il Sung as Great Father of Progressive Humankind
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups interwoven with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary between April 12 and 16.
					 The Zimbabwean paper Herald noted in an article titled "DPRK celebrates the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung" that the President was not only the leader of the country but tender-hearted father of all Koreans.
					
					 The President always found himself among the people, considering believing in them as in Heaven as his maxim, it added.
					
					 Tribuna Popular of Venezuela said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly great man boundlessly revered by world people for his undying exploits. He defeated the two formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialisms, demonstrating the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean people before the whole world.
					
					 The Indian paper Indian and World Event carried articles titled "Founder of socialist Korea" and "The sun is eternal" under the headline "On the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The Lao newspapers Heng Ngan and Noum Lao, L'Avenir of Democratic Congo, Sun Rise of Uganda, Uhuru of Tanzania and Noticias of Mozambique carried articles praising the glorious revolutionary career and undying exploits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Lectures and reading sessions on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" were held by the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions between April 22 and 26.
					 Anokhin Valeri Denisovich, honorary member of the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, said Kim Jong Un's work serves as a very important document as it is guidelines for invariably carrying forward the idea and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, holding them in high esteem as eternal leaders.
					
					 The tasks and ways for building a great prosperous powerful nation clarified in the work serve as an ideological, theoretical and practical weapon guaranteeing a bright future of the Korean people.
					
					 We will deeply study the work and widely disseminate it among followers of the Juche idea.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, quoted the dear respected Kim Jong Un as saying: "A country weak in national power cannot protect its sovereignty and the right to existence but will allow itself to be a plaything and a victim of the imperialists in the end. It is necessary to stick to the line of the Songun revolution and bolster its military capability to the maximum.
					
					 We must surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification true to the lifelong will and behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and make a positive contribution to the cause of accomplishing the cause of global independence."
					
					 The Korean people will surely accomplish the cause of Songun revolution and the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages made public statements on April 25 and 26 after studying the speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the military parade celebrating the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and the talk he had with leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on April 6.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said the speech and talk of supreme leader Kim Jong Un aroused worldwide lively response.
					
					 His speech and talk serve as important documents as they clarified the idea and line of the WPK, he added, and went on:
					
					 The works serve as guidelines to be held fast to by the army and people of Korea today when a new century of Kim Il Sung's Korea has begun.
					
					 Trotsky Serano, chairman of the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador, said his speech and work represent his intention to accomplish without a slight deflection the socialist cause pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is a prominent leader not only of the Korean people but of the world progressives and revolutionaries, he noted, adding:
					
					 The DPRK guided by him will always shed its rays as a fortress of socialism and beacon.

articles.title: Rosy Is Future of DPRK: Kuwaiti Organizations
articles.content:
Rosy Is Future of DPRK: Kuwaiti Organizations
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Centenary of the Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association jointly posted on Internet homepage a special write-up titled "The great leader President Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of mankind" on April 9.
					 Posted on the homepage are articles illustrated with photos on the revolutionary activities of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting Panmunjom and units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Korean people call their country Kim Il Sung's Korea and their nation Kim Il Sung's nation, the articles said, adding that Korea, once eclipsed on a map, is standing in the international arena as an indestructible power under the wise leadership of the President.
					
					 Rosy is the future of Korea as it is under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, the homepage noted, and continued;
					
					 The DPRK led by General Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the line of the President and Kim Jong Il who are immortal.
					
					 The DPRK does not allow even the slightest concession as regards its legitimate right in the international arena.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that the DPRK will accomplish its cause without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: French Public Figure Interviewed by TV after His Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
French Public Figure Interviewed by TV after His Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) -- Benua Tenedei, vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, gave his impressions of the DPRK, when interviewed by a TV reporter on April 26 after taking part in the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Saying that he had the privilege to watch various events including the military parade celebrating the centenary of the President's birth held at Kim Il Sung Square with splendor, he went on:
					
					 While the military parade was under way, I had the honor of seeing Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un very near from me and listened to his speech.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his speech clarified his will to carry forward the line and policies of the preceding leaders.
					
					 While staying in the DPRK we witnessed the achievements made by the DPRK in economic development. New skycrapers are standing up in rows and brightly-lit streets of the capital city at night were fascinating. I could feel that the overall standard of its people's living is in the process of improvement though there are economic difficulties. 
					
					 Witnessing the double standards of the U.S. and the West terming the DPRK satellite launch for peaceful purposes a violation of the UNSC resolution while patronizing and encouraging other countries' launch of long-range missiles, I keenly felt that the improved relations between the U.S. and the DPRK can hardly be expected unless the former rolls back its hostile policy toward the latter.
